question1.question: An App Builder at Universal Containers wants to include a new Visualforce page on the mobile navigation menu. What solution can the App Builder recommend for this requirement?
question1.option1text: Add the new Visualforce page to the smart search items section of the navigation menu.
question1.option1textexplanation: Incorrect. Before you can include Visualforce pages, Lightning pages, or Lightning components in the Salesforce app navigation menu, a new tab must be created for them.
question1.option2text: Move the Visualforce tab to the top of the navigation list.
question1.option2textexplanation: Incorrect. Before adjusting the navigation menu, a tab must created for the Visualforce page and then added to the navigation menu.
question1.option3text: Create a new Lightning app tab and include the app in the navigation menu.
question1.option3textexplanation: Incorrect. This does not meet the business requirements because a new Lightning app tab is not needed. Only a new Visualforce tab is needs to be added to the navigation menu.
question1.option4text: Create a new Visualforce tab and then add the tab to the navigation menu.
question1.option4textexplanation: Correct. Before you can include Visualforce pages, Lightning pages, or Lightning components in the Salesforce app navigation menu, a new tab must be created for them.
